document_data.name: Halbadan Belvrost
document_data.mainbody: '''Halbadan Belvrost''' was a fabled member of the [[Belvrost]] clan of mages. His tale was retold as of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: He was said to live beyond death as a whispering wraith, lurking around the mill- waiting for one who would help him recover a buried treasure he no longer had hands to dig for. Per the legend, he would not specify the nature of the treasure.
